front.title: Shortest Path Bridging (SPB) over an MPLS Packet Switched Network

abstract.t: This informational document describes ways to interconnect a Shortest Path Tree (SPT) Region over WAN connections using MPLS Pseudo Wires (PWs) with existing SPB and MPLS standards. It also describes how a combination of SPB and MPLS can provide a hierarchical scalable L2VPN.
